flavorText: "We are born soldiers. The call to battle is a homecoming."

foreignData.flavorText: „Wir sind geborene Soldaten. Der Ruf zur Schlacht ist wie ein Heimkommen."
foreignData.name: Flügelgestöber
foreignData.text: Bringe X 1/1 weiße (Vogel, Soldat)-Kreaturenspielsteine mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel, wobei X gleich der Anzahl der angreifenden Kreaturen ist.

foreignData.flavorText: "Nacemos soldados. El llamado a la batalla es una bienvenida."
foreignData.name: Ráfaga de alas
foreignData.text: Pon en juego X fichas de criatura Soldado Ave blancas 1/1 con la habilidad de volar, donde X es la cantidad de criaturas atacantes.

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous sommes nés soldats. L'appel du combat annonce notre retour au bercail. »
foreignData.name: Concert d'ailes
foreignData.text: Mettez en jeu X jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Oiseau et Soldat avec le vol, X étant le nombre de créatures attaquantes.

foreignData.flavorText: "Siamo nati soldati. La chiamata alle armi per noi è una rimpatriata."
foreignData.name: Tempesta d'Ali
foreignData.text: Metti in gioco X pedine creatura Soldato Uccello 1/1 bianche con volare, dove X è il numero di creature attaccanti.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我々は兵士として生まれた。 戦場への召集は帰郷というものだ。」
foreignData.name: 翼の疾風
foreignData.text: 飛行を持つ白の１/１の鳥・兵士・クリーチャー・トークンをＸ体場に出す。Ｘは攻撃しているクリーチャーの総数に等しい。

foreignData.flavorText: "Nós já nascemos soldados. O chamado da batalha é como voltar para casa."
foreignData.name: Rajada de Asas
foreignData.text: Coloque em jogo X fichas de criatura brancas 1/1 do tipo Ave Soldado com voar, sendo X igual ao número de criaturas atacantes.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мы — прирожденные солдаты. Призыв к бою для нас равносилен возвращению на родину».
foreignData.name: Крылатый Порыв
foreignData.text: Положите в игру X фишек существа 1/1 белая Птица Солдат с Полетом, где X — количество атакующих существ.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我们天生就是士兵。 战争号角是我们的返乡令。」
foreignData.name: 众翼飞舞
foreignData.text: 将X个1/1白色，具有飞行异能的鸟／士兵衍生物放置进场，X为进行攻击的生物数量。

name: Flurry of Wings
originalText: Put X 1/1 white Bird Soldier creature tokens with flying into play, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.

Flurry of Wings counts the number of creatures that are attacking as it resolves. It doesn’t matter how many creatures were originally declared as attackers that turn. It also doesn’t matter who controls those creatures, or who or what they’re attacking.
If Flurry of Wings is cast before attackers have been declared or after combat ends, it won’t do anything.

text: Create X 1/1 white Bird Soldier creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
